amendment.description: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds made available by this Act for the National Park Service to place any limitation on the number of air tours at national parks.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
